No ground chalk applied to maintain soil pH

The ab treatment plots were unlimed between 1965 - 1975 plot 12. Plot 15ab was limed. These plots correspond to the earlier limed plots (not for plot 12 which was all unlimed). In 1976 the ab plots were divided into a and b plots to maintain soil pH as per a and b treatment factor levels.
frequency: applied as required to achieve desired soil pH

description: The cd treatment plots were unlimed between 1965 - 1975. These plots correspond to the earlier unlimed plots. In 1976 the cd plots were divided into c and d plots to maintain soil pH as per c and d treatment factor levels.
The limed half of Plot 15 1920-1975, then divided into a and b sub-plots in 1976

No gound chalk applied to plot 12ab or plots 12cd 1903-1975. In 1976 the ab plots were divided into a and b plots to maintain soil pH as per a and b treatment factor levels and the cd plots were divided into c and d plots to maintain soil pH as per c and d treatment factor levels.
